subsectionContent.task: Przetłumacz polskie fragmenty zdań na język angielski.
content: If only ... (nie kupiła) this car. It's giving me lots of trouble.
Pam wishes the teachers ... (nie zadawali) her so much homework.
If only I ... (mógł studiować) in London. I would hace so many cool experiences!
Do you sometimes wish ... (żeby być) a completely different person?
Peter wishes he ... (urodził się) very rich. He wouldn't have to look for a job.

subsectionContent.task: Przetłumacz polskie fragmenty zdań na język angielski.
content: If only you ... (tell) me about your problems earlier!
I really wish my boyfriend ... (not spend) so much time watching sports on TV! It's driving me mad!
Do you sometimes wish you ... (be) a different person?
The party was a disaster and now I wish I ... (not go) there at all.
If only I  ... (have) more spare time for my hobbies!
Tom says he feels lonely in London and that he sometimes wishes he ... (never / leave) his hometown.
I (wish / would rather) my dad would spend more time at home.
I (would / had) sooner you stayd at home and helped me clean.
(It's time / If only) Mark had done all his assignments this semester.
It's (as if / time) Mary pursued an advanced degree if she wants to be a teacher.
(If only / I'd rather) I had attended a vocational school. I'd be a trained mechanic by now.
Look at all these people. It's (As though / about time) we were back at school again. Nobody has changed a bit!

subsectionContent.task: Uzupełnij zdania właściwą formą czasowników podanych w nawiasach.
content: If only I ... (not forget) to study physics last night! I'm afraid I did horribly on the quiz.
It's high time you ... (start) taking your lessons seriously or you'll never get into a good university.
I would rather you ... (help) me with my homework after I've tried it myself. I want to see what I know.
Supposing you ... (begin) studying French sooner, you'd speak it even better now!
I wish you ... (enter) the science competition. I'm sure you would have won a prize.
Imagine you ... (can see) what the future ... (hold).
My parents would sooner I ... (pursue) my own interests instead of trying to fulfil their ambitions.
Tim acts as if he ... (be) a famous scientist rather than a clever 14-year-old.

subsectionContent.task: Uzupełnij drugie zdanie tak, aby znaczyło to samo, co pierwsze, używając podanego słowa.
content:
What a shame she couldn't see our performance! ABLE
I wish she ... see our performance.

It is rather impolite of you to ask him such personal questions. ASK
I'd ... him such personal questions!

I should have followed my father's advice. ONLY
If ... my father's advice.

You definitely need to start taking regular exercise. TIME
It's ... regular exercise.

I really regret buying such an old car! NOT
I wish ... such an old car!

It's a pity I haven't got anything to read on the train. ONLY
... something to read on the train!

subsectionContent.task: Utwórz nowe zdania używając słów podanych w nawiasach.
content: I would prefer for them to take the exam at a later date. (sooner)
You've left it a long time to start keeping a journal! (high)
He is so quick that it seems like he understands new ideas immediately. (though)
Think about the possibility of getting into Harvard or Yale. It would be so exciting! (suppose)
I'm really sorry I gave her the wrong homework assignment! (only)
It would be better for you to spend more time studying. (rather)
You waited a long time to take your piano playing seriously. (about)
Think about the possibility of winning a lot of money! Would you spend it on your education? (imagine)
answers: I would sooner they took the exam at a later time.
It's high time you started keeping a journal.
He is so quick as though he understands new ideas immediately.
Suppose you got into Harvard or Yale. It would be so exciting.
If only I hadn't given her the wrong homework assignment.
I would rather you spent more time studying.
It's about time you took your piano playing seriously.
Imagine you won a lot of money. Would you spend it on your education?

content: Załuję, że nie mam wystarczająco dużo pieniędzy, żeby zapłacić czesne.
Gdybym tylko nie byłą dla niej taka niemiła.
Żałuję, że mam jutro test. Poszłabym z wami do kina.
Powiedzmy, że musiałbyś jutro przystąpić do egzaminu z matematyki? Zdałbyś go?
A co, gdybyś nie miała dostępu do Internetu przez kilka dni?
Wolelibyśmy, żeby nauczyciele dawali nam mniej pracy domowej.
answers: I wish I had enough money to pay the tuition fees.
If only I hadn't been so unkind to her.
I wish I didn't have a test tomorrow. I'd go to the cinema with you.
Supposing you had to sit a maths exam tomorrow. Would you pass it?
Suppose you had no internet access for a few days?
We'd rather teachers gave us less homework.
